title: Any possible way to bypass the launcher and go straight to the log in screen?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I recall being able to do so before on my other computer because I chose to be part of the new client, but on my new computer which is my current one, I decided to stick to the legacy client and now that it's gone I'd like it if I could just go straight to the log in screen. Any rioter or anyone think they can help me? Arigato ~ <3

replies.body: The client should automatically attempt to prepare you for the new client as soon as you launch it.  If this isn't happening for you then there might be some files failing to load up.  I suggest downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a clean reinstall to get you to the most recent version before the update.  You should be able to transition after that!
